body.name: Ekouaer Sleepwear Womens Snap Front Nightgown Housecoat Cotton Duster Short Sleeve House Dress
features: Fabric type Super Soft & Lightweight Material

【HIGH QUALITY MATERIAL】The Solid House Dress is made of 100% Cotton, the Floral Housecoat is made of 100% Rayon. Lightweight and soft fabric make you more cool and comfortable,very suitable for lounge dress and muu dress

【UNIQUE DESIGN】The Housecoats and Dusters with special scoopneck design,elegant and beautiful.And 2 big side pockets that add a touch of functionality and style.Snap front is easy to slip on and off,midi length to provide great coverage

【SUITABLE FOR EVERYONE】Loose fit house dress can fit everyone easily, whether you are Petite or Plus size. Perfect for Spring,Summer and Fall. The mumu dresses are also great for maternity/after-delivery wear

【IDEAL GIFT】Ekouaer Duster Robe is perfect for sleepwear, loungewear, or casual wear at home. Also a perfect choice as bathrobe, lounge dress,sleep shirt,house coat,nursing home gown,casual dress for the elderly women. An Ideal gift for your mom, wife and friends

【WARM TIPS】Washing Max Temperature 40°C.Do not Bleach. Our sizes are standard US sizes, if you prefer a less snug fit, it is recommended that you choose a larger size. Our Model Size: Height 175cm, Bust 90cm, Waist 60cm, Hip 91cm

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Ekouaer Women's Snap Front Sleepwear Short Sleeve House Dress

Women's Housecoat and Casual Loungewear Super comfort and soft Ekouaer short sleeve nightgown long lounger sleep dress dusters with classic solid color style and printed floral. Give you an easy fit, snap front closure for stress-free wear.

Previous page Careful Design Fashion O neckline, snap front sleepwear with two pockets. The duster robe with lovely prints makes you beautiful while roaming in the garden. Durable Housecoat is a good helper for your housekeeping. Wearing casual house coats allows you to enjoy your free time. Next page 1 Cotton Dusters 2 Pinted Housecoats 3 Lightweight Robe 4 Floral Patio Dress 5 Plus Size Mumu Dress

Essential 100% Cotton/Rayon Nightgown Women's snap front housecoats cotton dusters The Sleep Gown/Snap front closure Duster/Long lounger House Dress/Housecoats and Dusters with special scoopneck/2 big great pockets that add functionality. Nightgown dusters with loose and casual lounger design. Ultra-soft,lightweight and breathable,even nice for maternity sleepwear. Perfect for sleepwear,lounger wear or casual wear at home.

Is the fabric of the housecoats cotton? The Solid House Dress is made of 100% Cotton, the Floral Housecoat is made of 100% Rayon. Why do dusters wrinkle? Because the fabric of the Solid Duster is pure cotton so it is easy to wrinkle. But cotton fiber is a natural fiber, the fiber can absorb water from the surrounding atmosphere, its water content is 8%-10%, soft to the touch but not stiff. Is there snaps on the front of this house coat? or are the snaps just for decoration? Snaps on the front of the sleepwear can be opened easily, not for decoration. Can I put a 6.8-inch phone in house dress pocket? Sufficient to hold objects up to 7 inches. Can it be worn outside? Of course, it can be worn as Patio Dress, Casual Dress, Lounge Dress and Maternity Dress.

SIZE CHART Garment Care: Washing Max Temperature 40°C, Do not Bleach About Size: There are 6 sizes (S, M, L, XL, XXL,XXXL) available for the listing. Please allow 1-2cm differences due to manual measurement, thanks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars great for hot humid climate--hard to find 100%cotton (only the solid color dresses)
reviews.reviewText: The material is thin cotton, a hard to find material these days, so great for the hot weather in the Gulf south! I am 5'2" 155lb age 72. I bought a size medium blue dress and the fit is perfect around the top. It is very roomy around the middle but still looks good, not baggy. The fabric is smooth, soft, so comfy! I washed it in cold water and hung to dry. Some wrinkling but not bad, and who cares, anyway--it's a house dress! Perfect for working around the house. Love the big pockets, so useful. Love it so much I am buying another solid cotton one in a different color.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The fit is perfect, it is comfortable & well made = sturdy. I didn't especially like white covers with a snap closure. As the print I selected is the black background with small to medium-sized white flowers all over the dark background, the white-flowers camouflage the round white snap covers down the front seam of this garment. I was searching for Hawaiian Muu Muus when this popped up. However, 100% Cotton Fabric is difficult to find & this is 100% cotton. As I'll be spending my 1st Summer in the Mojave Desert in California, and it's already 80°F's to 90°F so I had to buy this garment to be cooler & more comfortable. This garment is also quite comfortable to sleep in bed wearing. I haven't laundered it yet but soon & I'll add those results after it has hung dry. I love this "robe" & want to wear it every day as it is the most comfortable summer garment I now own. Buy it! You will not be disappointed!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Runs a bit small
reviews.reviewText: The product itself seems to be of good quality but I ordered a XL expecting it to be a little large. However, sizes seem to run a little bit small. My XL seems like a European size XL, or American size L. Sizing is close enough that I'm keeping it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars OVERHAULING MY INDOOR WEAR!
reviews.reviewText: This Housecoat is just the thing to clean in. I get warm when I’m cleaning. I don’t prefer wearing pants at home. Especially when I’m cleaning. Bathrobes are thick and often hot for wearing while cleaning too. Plus no matter what I wear to clean up in it gets dusty, dirty, or wet.It’s taken a long time to decide to overhaul my wardrobe. I bought this Housecoat as a start. The material is light. It fits well. And it’s about the right length, for the Spring and Summer. Something has to be worn under this item because it is see through. This can be dressed up a little. If company suddenly comes over, unexpectedly, a few accessories will work: a belt, a beaded necklace, bracelet and a pair of low pumps should suffice. I would keep those handy to quickly add on, but not to use while I’m cleaning.As part of my overhauling I’m going to buy more of these to be added to other indoor type garments: Longer Sleeve House garments for cleaning when it’s colder, Nightwear, for nighttime, and Loungers for daywear. The ideal is to wear the appropriate garment at the appropriate time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Cute but Not Sturdy
reviews.reviewText: On 3rd wear last snap broke. It was light usage since I’m recovering and in bed. Since it’s the last snap broke now the robe opens too much and is unusable. It was a little short for anyone over 5’9. Does have a cute retro vibe if it doesn’t break on you. Now I have to find another robe! :(

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars The size runs small
reviews.reviewText: I believe I have ordered from this company before and a 2X fit me. I think that this particular design was considerably smaller and I can't wear it. The color is nice and the workmanship is good but I do not think that it is a 2X in American sizing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This robe is comfortable and fits well. It does wrinkle some as it’s all cotton but since it’s just an indoor item, it doesn’t matter too much. I like the design and the fact that it snaps.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to wear around my house while recovering from abdominal surgery. My parents are helping so I wanted to be covered appropriately while having access to wounds and to just be comfortable. This works for all of that. I bought a few different styles from this brand actually and have been happy with all of them.
a bit too small my own fault
Muy buena calidad y acabado, 100% algodón y la talla si corresponde
